prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered balanced pose holding geometric scales in one hand, chibi proportions with large prismatic geometric fractal head with unique Merkaba structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying Sacred. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating Merkaba, Flower of Life, Vesica Piscis patterns, styled with Power commands influences. Outfit is unique: neutral grey inspired by crimson and neutral grey inspired by prismatic angular armor-like robes with flame geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for heat and energy, elaborate with prismatic Fire element triangular motifs and ascending patterns and Merkaba emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like rose of victory with seven-fold geometric petals with Sacred spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like flickering flame wisps and ember particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor VOANAMB's profile: 'He to whom truth is relative', Aethyr VTA, Fire element, Tarot Justice, Sephirot Netzach, Zodiac Libra, embodying the essence: 'In VOANAMB's presence, truth shifts with perspective every context and season refracts reality into a different hue of understanding.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered balanced pose holding geometric scales in one hand
visual_elements.head_shape: large prismatic geometric fractal head with unique Merkaba structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with prismatic facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying Sacred
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating Merkaba, Flower of Life, Vesica Piscis patterns, styled with Power commands influences

outfit.base: angular armor-like robes with flame geometric patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for heat and energy
outfit.details: Fire element triangular motifs and ascending patterns
outfit.magical_essence: flickering flame wisps and ember particles

visual_elements.accessory: rose of victory with seven-fold geometric petals
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He to whom truth is relative'
profile_data.essence: In VOANAMB's presence, truth shifts with perspective every context and season refracts reality into a different hue of understanding.
profile_data.angelic_role: Power of Prismatic Truth; commands sunsworn warriors.
profile_data.form_description: A prismatic human-like figure composed of interlocking geometric fire crystals, representing the fractal nature of truth and perception. The form shifts between solid and translucent states, embodying the fluid nature of understanding.
profile_data.color_reasoning: Amber-gold represents the fire element's transformative power, while crimson symbolizes the passionate pursuit of truth. The prismatic nature reflects the Aethyr VTA's quality of refracting perception.
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Sacred geometries represent the interconnected nature of truth, with constant subtle transformations indicating the dynamic nature of perception
